title: Coding Instructor
name: Girls Who Code
description: Introduced over 60 elementary school girls to visual block coding through Scratch and ignited their passion for programming.
Designed, implemented, and walked through girls a semester long coding project.
Presented and explained computer science concepts such as the design of algorithms.
Facilitated discussions between students on real-world applications in computing.

title: Resident Assistant
name: University of Pittsburgh, Residence Life
description: Facilitated and aided in programming events for Pitt Residence Life.
Fostered a welcoming and inclusive environment for first-year residents.
Collaborated in a coordinated team, assisting fellow staff members for additional responsibilities.

title: Assistant Instructor
name: Exploring Cybersecurity Pathways
description: Boosted students' confidence in technology by providing an introduction to cybersecurity.
Helped students with security vulnerability testing and network scanning.
Assisted students with the Bash Shell and Unix tools.
